description: Name of treatment; Burn = prescribed burn; Thin = mechanical thining; Burn+Thin = both prescribed burn and mechancial thin; Control = control.
Fuel classification. 1-hr fuels, 10-hr fuels, 100-hr fuels, and sum of 1-, 10-,  100-hr, 1000h (R and S), and litter and/or duff  fuels
Year in which fuel load was measured
Standard error of average fuel load. Not available for Teakettle.
Percent difference between fuel load in the Treatment relative to the Control.
Standard error of the percent difference between Treatment and Control fuel load. Not available for Teakettle.
Lower bound of 95% confidence interval of the percent difference between Treatment and Control fuel load
Upper bound of 95% confidence interval of the percent difference between Treatment and Control fuel load
